casebody.data:
STATE ex rel.
v.
RATE BUREAU. No. 596A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2004. William M. Trott, Marvin M. Spivey, Raleigh, for North Carolina Rate Bureau. Sherri L. Hubbard, Cary, Stewart L. Johnson, Raleigh, for Commissioner of Insurance.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of March 2004 by Appellant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Appellant (North Carolina Rate Bureau) shall have up to and including the 17th day of March 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2004.
